item.title: API configuration documentation
item.description: Description: This topic documents a feature related to the configuration of Cloud API, Guidewire’s REST API platform. Tools: Oxygen (for authoring), Intellij (for testing) Additional Context: This topic is part of the Cloud API Developer Guide, which describes in detail the configuration capabilities of Guidewire Cloud API. The target audience is configuration developers familiar with the Guidewire ecosystem. Preload Requests PDF

item.title: API payments guide
item.description: Description: This is content I wrote to document Guidewire’s Billing API. This chapter describes how producers (otherwise known as insurance agents or brokers) can make and manage payments to BillingCenter through the API. Tools: Postman, Oxygen, Github
